headline: How Kinder Morgan's Strong Results Dividend Increase and Insider Buying Have Changed Its Investment Story (KMI)
summary: Kinder Morgan recently reported strong quarterly results, highlighted by a 16% increase in adjusted earnings per share, a 6% rise in EBITDA, and a 2% dividend increase, with Director Amy Chronis purchasing 4,287 shares to bring her total holdings to 39,051. The combination of robust operational performance in the natural gas segment, a dividend boost, and insider buying activity reflects growing management confidence and ongoing shareholder value focus. We'll explore how the recent dividend...
